A4.text: As You Likeâ€¯It follows its heroine Rosalind as she flees persecution in her uncle's court, accompanied by her cousin Celia to find safety and, eventually, love, in the Forest of Arden.

A5.text: The majority of the action transpires in the 'Forest of Arden,' a location that is imposed on the play by Lodge Jr's source text.
